rules_text:
Choose one –
• Cabracan's Decree deals 3 damage to target creature.
• Cabracan's Decree deals 3 damage to target player.
• Players can't gain life this turn. Damage can't be prevented this turn.
If your ancestry in red is five or greater, you may choose all three instead. [i](Each red card in your graveyard counts towards your ancestry in red.)[/i]
